Package io.micronaut.http.annotation

Annotation Interface ClientFilter

@Documented @Retention(RUNTIME) @Target(TYPE) @Bean @DefaultScope(jakarta.inject.Singleton.class) public @interface ClientFilter
Mark a bean as a filter for the HTTP client. The bean may declare RequestFilters and ResponseFilters.
Since:
4.0.0
Author:
Jonas Konrad
